document_data.mainbody:
ordal was a small village located on the island of Norland within the Moonshae Isles.
Sordal sat along the western edge of South Jotunhammer Mountains within the region of Norland called Grondsgrunn which was controlled by giants. The village was found on Norlands eastern coast with the Sea of Moonshae. It was the southernmost village on Norland.
